title: Modern home for sale or lease
details:
Architect design modern home built at kahatuduwa city of life.Location of this house is quiet and charm. 800m distance to southern highway enterance. Total size of the house about 4000sq.ft.bult in 10perch land.The house design with five bed rooms,three bathrooms, servant toilet, Master bedroom design with attach bathroom and 18000 btu Air condition.Also contain two balconies,two rooftops, modern pantry, living area,dining,kitchen.
The land surround by 9ft wall and remote roller door.And CCTV cameras ,security system.
